00025     // The file's constructors make heavy use of the 'this' pointer, in a safe
00026     // manner. MSVC isn't smart enough to know that it's safe.

00055 template <class Alloc = std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool Threadsafe = true,
00056     bool Secure = false>
00057 class integer_t: private detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>,
00058     public any_integer
00059 {
00060     public:
00061     typedef integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> type;
00062 
00065     integer_t();
00066     integer_t(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& b, bool
00067         force_thread_safety = false);
00068     integer_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this, 1) { _swap(b); }
00069     explicit integer_t(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00070     explicit integer_t(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base = 10);
00071     explicit integer_t(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00072     explicit integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0);
00073     explicit integer_t(const any_integer& other, bool force_thread_safety =
00074         false);
00075     template <typename Type> integer_t(const Type n,
00076         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);
00077 
00078     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00079 
00080     integer_t(const detail::data_t c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00081         Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length, c.negative) {
00082         data.beginendmod(); }
00083     #endif
00084 
00085 
00094     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(
00095         type) c);
00096     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) c) {
00097         _swap(c); return *this; }
00098     template <typename Type> integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator=(
00099         const Type n) { integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> nn(n); _swap(nn);
00100         return *this; }
00101 
00102     bool operator!() const { return data.is_zero(); }
00103     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> operator-() const;
00104     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator+() { return *this; }
00105     const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator+() const { return
00106         *this; }
00107 
00108     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator+=(const integer_t<Alloc,
00109         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00111         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00113         Threadsafe, Secure> b);

00115         Threadsafe, Secure> b);
00116     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator%=(const integer_t<Alloc,
00117         Threadsafe, Secure> b);
00118

00122     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>  operator--(int);
00123

00125         Threadsafe, Secure> n);

00129         Threadsafe, Secure> n);

00131     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>  operator>>(size_t shift) const;
00132     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator<<=(size_t shift);
00133     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& operator>>=(size_t shift);
00135 
00138     bool is_odd() const;
00139     bool is_even() const;
00140     int  sign(bool signed_zero = false) const;
00141     size_t hex_digits() const;
00143 
00144     typedef base_divide_t<integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> > divide_t;
00145 
00153 
00154     static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> pow2(size_t exponent);
00155     static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> factorial(size_t n);
00156     template <class Type> static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
00157         random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on = false,
00158         bool low_bit_on = false, bool can_be_negative = false);
00159     template <class Type> static integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>
00160         random_prime(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback =
00161         no_callback);
00163 
00164     void _swap(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& s) { using std::swap;
00165         swap(data, s.data); }
00166 
00167     private:
00168     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00169 };

00175 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00176 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::integer_t(): any_integer(*this, 1) {
00177     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00178 }
00179 
00190 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00191 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::integer_t(const integer_t<Alloc,
00192     Threadsafe, Secure>& b, bool force_thread_safety): detail::digitmanager_t<
00193     Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(*b.data.holder()), any_integer(*this,
00194     b.data.length, b.data.negative)
00195 {
00196     data.beginendmod();
00197     if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00198 }

00202 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::integer_t(const char *str, size_t base):
00203     any_integer(*this, 1)
00204 {
00205     data.from_string(str, strlen(str), base);

00318 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00319 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::integer_t(const any_integer& c, bool):
00320     any_integer(*this, 1)
00321 {
00322     if (c._data().is_nan()) throw exceptions::not_a_number();
00323     data.duplicate_data(c._data());
00324 }

00338 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00339 template <typename Type> integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::integer_t(const
00340     Type n, typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*):
00341     any_integer(*this, 1)
00342 {
00343     if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00344     else data.set_unsigned(n);
00345 }

00662 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00663 template <class Type>
00664 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00665     Secure>::random_by_size(Type& gen, size_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on,
00666     bool low_bit_on, bool can_be_negative)
00667 {
00668     detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00669 
00670     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00671     detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00672         low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00673     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00674 }

00707 {

00709 
00710     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r;
00711     detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);

00732 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00733 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> abs(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00734     Secure> n)
00735 {
00736     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(abs(n._data()));
00737     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00757 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00758 typename integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t divide(const
00759     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> dividend, const integer_t<Alloc,
00760     Threadsafe, Secure> divisor)
00761 {
00762     typename integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>::divide_t r;
00763     divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00764         divisor._data());
00765     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00766 }

01084 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> powmod(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,

01192 template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
01193 integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> operator+(const integer_t<Alloc,
01194     Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2)
01195 {
01196     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(n1._data() + n2._data());

01338     Secure> num1, const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> num2)

01405 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
01406     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01407     rtype op(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n1, const N n2) { \
01408         return op(n1, integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n2)); \
01409     } \
01410     \
01411     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01412     rtype op(const N n1, const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> n2) { \
01413         return op(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>(n1), n2); \
01414     }

01425 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_MATH(op) \
01426     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01427     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, \
01428         Secure> n1, const N n2) \
01429     { \
01430         integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(n1, integer_t<Alloc, \
01431             Threadsafe, Secure>(n2))); \
01432         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01433     } \
01434     \
01435     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01436     integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> op(const N n1, const integer_t<Alloc, \
01437         Threadsafe, Secure> n2) \
01438     { \
01439         integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure> r(op(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, \
01440             Secure>(n1), n2)); \
01441         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01442     }

01480 inline void swap(integer_t<Alloc, Threadsafe, Secure>& left, integer_t<Alloc,
01481     Threadsafe, Secure>& right)
